about.details:
SKP Bearing Industries Limited manufactures needle rollers, cylindrical rollers, pins, and steel balls. The company supplies its products to diverse industries such as textiles, automobiles, etc. across India. The company also exports rolling elements to international customers in Brazil, Argentina, UAE, etc.
 
SKP Bearing Industries Limited has also ventured into the power generation business by installing a windmill in the year 2012-2013 at Survey No. 646, vill: Seth Vadala, Taluka: Jamjodhpur, Jamnagar Forest Division, Gujarat with a commissioned capacity of 0.80 MW.
 
The company also has a solar plant situated at Survey No. 25/M., Village Rojhana, Teh: Baroda, Dist.: Agar, Madhya Pradesh, and other windmills situated at Survey No. 143/2, Village: Jamuniameena, P.H.N.-52, Mandsaur, Madhya Pradesh, and Village Rautwadi, Tal. Koregaon, District Satara, Maharashtra with a commissioned capacity of 0.63MW, 1.5 MW and 0.80 MW respectively for the generation and sale of power and electricity to various customers.
 
Competitive Strengths:
  • One of the players in manufacturing of multiple rolling elements in India under single roof.
  • Quality Assurance and Quality Control of the products.
  • Wide and Stable customer base.
  • Experienced management and dedicated employee base.
  • Diversifying the product mix and increasing penetration in markets.
  • Cost effective production and timely fulfilment of orders.

faqs.question: What is the SKP Bearing Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
SKP Bearing Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 4400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹30.80 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹70 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on June 30, 2022, and closes on July 5, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in SKP Bearing Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in SKP Bearing Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in SKP Bearing Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in SKP Bearing Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'SKP Bearing Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When SKP Bearing Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The SKP Bearing Industries IPO opens on June 30, 2022 and closes on July 5, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of SKP Bearing Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: SKP Bearing Industries IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for SKP Bearing Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in SKP Bearing Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is SKP Bearing Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for SKP Bearing Industries IPO will be done on Friday, July 8, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, July 12, 2022. Check the SKP Bearing Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is SKP Bearing Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The SKP Bearing Industries IPO listing date is on Wednesday, July 13, 2022.
